headline: NextEra Energy announces date for release of fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 financial results
summary: NextEra Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NEE) today announced that it plans to report fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 financial results before the opening of the New York Stock Exchange on Tuesday, Jan. 27, 2026, in a news release to be posted on the company's website at www.NextEraEnergy.com/FinancialResults. The company will issue an advisory news release over PR Newswire the morning of Jan. 27, with a link to the financial results news release on the company's website.
